alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sierra County through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles northeast of Engle. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Sierra County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes
